content:
Novi RPi za 5$:

Lastnosti:

- A Broadcom BCM2835 application processor; 1GHz ARM11 core (40% faster than Raspberry Pi 1)
- 512MB of LPDDR2 SDRAM
- A micro-SD card slot
- A mini-HDMI socket for 1080p60 video output
- Micro-USB sockets for data and power
- An unpopulated 40-pin GPIO header
- Identical pinout to Model A+/B+/2B
- An unpopulated composite video header
- Our smallest ever form factor, at 65mm x 30mm x 5mm

 
	

 

https://www.raspberrypi.org/blog/raspberry-pi-zero
http://hackaday.com/2015/11/25/the-5-raspberry-pi-zero/
http://www.element14.com/community/docs/DOC-79263?CMP=SOM-GOOGLEPLUS-PRG-RASPI-PIZERO-LANDING

content: Kje si našel ceno 5$? Na ebayu so ranga 40€...
author: Odisej

content:
Citat:
Uporabnik Odisej pravi:
 Kje si našel ceno 5$? Na ebayu so ranga 40€...
		
		Klikni za razširitev
	

Jaz sem jih naroči 5 komadov,  pa ne bom toliko plačal z poštino vred.    Jaz jih dobim naslednji teden.    Če rabiš, ti jaz prodam 2 komada za 40 €
